pr_title: [Communication] - All - Add Identifier suffix to all CommunicationIdentifiers

timeline.message: Adding Identifier suffix to all CommunicationIdentifiers

timeline.bodyText:
Creates a PhoneNumber object => Creates a PhoneNumberIdentifier object
Probably worthwhile to look for similar comments in the other classes too. "the string identifier representing the PhoneNumber" can stay unchanged, just add the *Identifier when referring to the exact type.
timeline.author: DominikMe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@
      * E.164 is a phone number formatted as +[CountryCode][AreaCode][LocalNumber] eg. "+18005555555"

timeline.author: jbeauregardb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@
      * @param id the string identifier representing the identity

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/communication/azure-communication-common/src/main/java/com/azure/communication/common/CommunicationUserIdentifier.java b/sdk/communication/azure-communication-common/src/main/java/com/azure/communication/common/CommunicationUserIdentifier.java
index 6c8d6970a57..6b4cd59c308 100644
--- a/sdk/communication/azure-communication-common/src/main/java/com/azure/communication/common/CommunicationUserIdentifier.java
+++ b/sdk/communication/azure-communication-common/src/main/java/com/azure/communication/common/CommunicationUserIdentifier.java

@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@ public class CommunicationUserIdentifier extends CommunicationIdentifier {
     private final String id;
 
     /**
-     * Creates a CommunicationUser object
+     * Creates a CommunicationUserIdentifier object
      * 
      * @param id the string identifier representing the identity
      * @throws IllegalArgumentException thrown if id parameter fail the validation.

timeline.bodyText: This is generated code. Is this the result of swagger file change and regeneration or a manual change?
timeline.author: JianpingChen

replies.bodyText: @JianpingChen This is actually not generated code, we're just adding these new classes. All generated code is in the implementation folder.
replies.author: minnieliu

timeline.bodyText: Which README.md has reference to this code? Anything in that README.md should be changed accordingly?
timeline.author: JianpingChen

replies.bodyText: No, these lines are not used directly in the README just there for complication purposes.
replies.author: minnieliu
